Package library.members

Class Member

java.lang.Object
library.members.Member
Direct Known Subclasses:
Employee, Student
public abstract class Member extends Object
Abstract base class representing a library member. This class provides the basic information for a member, such as their name, address, and phone number. It serves as a foundation for various types of members (e.g., students, employees, etc.). Members can borrow and return items from the library, which are tracked in a borrowed items list.

      Returns:

    • borrowItem

      public void borrowItem(LibraryItem item, int quantity)
      Allows the member to borrow a specified quantity of a library item.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be borrowed.
      quantity - The number of copies to borrow.

    • returnItem

      public void returnItem(LibraryItem item, int quantity)
      Allows the member to return a specified quantity of a borrowed library item. If the quantity being returned is greater than or equal to the quantity borrowed, the item is removed.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to return.
      quantity - The number of copies to return.

    • updateDetails

      public void updateDetails(String name, String address, String phoneNumber)
      Updates the member's details, including name, address, and phone number.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the member.
      address - The new address of the member.
      phoneNumber - The new phone number of the member.
